title: The Girl I Met on the Matchmaking App Turned Out to Be My Student
author: Jun Minosaki
description:
Shugo Kizaki, a high school teacher, starts using a dating app after the wedding of a friend.

Through a chance encounter, he meets the highly popular (with over 1000 “likes”) beautiful girl “Sakuran” on the app.

However, Sakuran turns out to be—his student (a high schooler)!?

“You’re underestimating the app, Sensei! I’ll teach you how to become popular on the app!”

After saving Sakuran from a crisis, Shugo is taught the secrets to gaining attention on the app as a reward.

He begins his search for the ideal partner, charging ahead into the battlefield of dating apps!

From Jun Minosaki, the author of Hundred series, comes a love hunting guide and romantic comedy!!

title: I Started Working a Housekeeping Job and Ended up Being Liked by the Family of the Most Beautiful Girl in School
author: Shiohon
description:
During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka’s family and begins regularly visiting her house.

From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school. This charming and awkward housekeeping rom-com featuring the most innocent and beautiful girl in school and a secretly high-spec guy begins!

title: A Promise Fulfilled. The Marquess’s Son-in-Law Is Showered with Love
author: Yumi Yamabuki
description:
"When I grow up, I'll ask my father and promise to come for you. So please, hold on until then."

These words from Vee, a girl he met as a child, became the boy's emotional support. Even if it was just a verbal promise.

Theodore, the second son of the House of Count Allerton, is forced to handle all the paperwork that his older brother, Rodrick, should be doing. Unable to match his brother, a member of the Royal Capital's Knightly Order, in skill, Theodore quietly performs these tasks. However, their parents are oblivious to this reality, believing that the younger brother is merely assisting the heir of the family.

An offer of marriage into the family of the Margrave Harvey suddenly comes to Theodore. His father, wanting to establish a connection with the margrave's family, which is favored by the royal family, quickly decides to push Theodore into it. When Theodore arrives at the margrave's home, the one waiting for him is the very same girl from all those years ago.

title: The Strongest Mage of the Fallen Star: As an Exiled Prince, I Gained Lovely Wives and Dominate Without Equal Day and Night
author: Yukimi Salsa
description:
The man, who in his previous life was a corporate wage slave, is reincarnated as Shalka, the eldest son of the exiled royal family Ortenos, who were driven from their country by a coup d’état staged by corrupt nobles.

By a strange twist of fate, he acquires the strongest magical power, but he chooses to hand over the family headship to his beautiful half-sister, intending to live a carefree life enjoying passionate nights with his lovely wives — or so he thought.

Before long, the nation of Naia, born from that very coup, suddenly launches an invasion against Ortenos.

For the sake of his adorable sister, and to protect his sweet lovey-dovey life with his charming wives, Shalka takes up arms to defeat the enemy nation and restore the Kingdom of Ortenos…!

Thus begins an otherworldly harem war chronicle!

title: [WN] Dragged Into Another World, But Bad Luck Isn’t the End of My Story
author: Snow chrysanthemum
description:
**"I just want an ordinary life!"**  
A reincarnated man with a knack for getting dragged into trouble stumbles through a fantastical new world!

**Chapter 1: Reincarnation Begins with a Man-Made Disaster**  
_"I–I’m terribly sorry…!! There’s been a mistake!!"_

Caught up in an otherworldly summoning gone horribly wrong—a true man-made disaster—an ordinary man is killed in the chaos and finds himself _strong-armed_ into reincarnation whether he likes it or not as the breathtakingly beautiful boy, Harold.

Determined to make the best of it, Harold adopts a personal motto: _“Live within my means.”_ His plan? A quiet, unremarkable life as a rural commoner.

The problem? The goddess who took a liking to him insists on saddling him with “gifts” like the **Favor of the Goddess Forte**, **Alchemist**, **Dimensional Storage**, and **Magic Eye (Appraisal)**. Oh, and his innate **Green Hand** skill? Turns out that’s a legendary ability in this world.

Before he knows it, Harold is shipped off to the Royal Academy in the capital—a place for nobles and other skilled youths—under compulsory enrollment. All he wants is a peaceful school life with his new friends… but special powers have a way of attracting _special problems_.

From winning over fairies that haven’t shown themselves in decades, to accidentally solving a royal family’s age-old dilemma, Harold keeps standing out in all the wrong ways.

Can he ever achieve the humble, peaceful life he longs for—or will the world keep pulling him center stage?
